songs.title: Free Fallin
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
D/F#  G     G      D/F#  A
She's a good  girl, loves  her   mama.
      D/F# G       G    D/F#  A
Loves Je- sus, and America    too.
       D/F#  G     G      D/F#  A
Shes a good  girl, crazy 'bout  Elvis
      D/F# G            G   D/F#   A
Loves hor- ses, and her boy-friend too, yeah yeah.

[Verse 2]
       D/F#  G   G      D/F#  A
It's a long  day living in    Reseda.
          D/F#  G   G       D/F#        A
There's a free- way runnin' through the yard.
      D/F#  G            G     D/F#  A
I'm a bad   boy 'cause I don't even  miss her.
      D/F#  G       G        D/F#  A
I'm a bad   boy for breakin' her   heart.

[Chorus]
        D/F#  G   G   D/F#   A
And I'm free,
     D/F#     G       G   D/F#   A
Free fallin', fallin'
        D/F#  G   G   D/F#   A
And I'm free,
     D/F#     G       G   D/F#   A
Free fallin', fallin'

songs.title: Yard Man
songs.lyrics:
[intro]
D      D      D     B/D       C/D x2
[VERSE]
D
I wake up early and I load the truck, 
                         B/D     C/D
I grab a biscuit while I gas her up
D
Every morning it's the same old thing 
                       B/D      C/D
just another day of living the dream
D
Of a YARDMAN

D
I start my morning on the bankers lawn,
                               B/D     C/D
It's kind of funny because I'm overdrawn
D
I know he's sitting on bail out bones 
                                   B/D    C/D
you know old pinstripes ought to float a loan
       D
To the YARDMAN 

[CHORUS] 
G               F                            D
That Briggs and Stratton is ringing in my ears
G                       F                  D
I've been walking that dog for nearly 15 years
G        F                     D
Working long so I can pay my bills
G            F                      A
Breaking my back on country club Hills

[VERSE]
D
Driving up to the mansion on the hill
                     B/D          C/D
going to work now to mow for old Bill    
D                            
His daughters been looking my way 
                               B/D          C/D
but you can't shop rodeo on a working man's pay
D
I'm the yard man

[REPEAT CHORUS]

[VERSE]
D
John Deere called just the other day, 
                                  B/D   C/D
time to get that tractor out of layaway
D
But I'm so tired of working for the man
                                       B/D       C/D
I think I'll move to the beach now, and mow the sandâ€¦ 
         D
I'm  the yard man

[CHORUS]

[OUTRO - SPOKEN]
D
Gonna grab my darlin and ditch this ho
D                             B/D      C/D
Trade this weed wacker for a fishing pole

songs.title: Give Me One Reason
songs.lyrics:
Capo II *

E A B7 E

E                              A          B7               E    E7 E
Give me one reason to stay here, and I'll turn right back around
A                              A7         B7               E   E7 E
Give me one reason to stay here, and I'll turn right back around
          B7
Because I don't want leave you lonely
    A                            E    E7 E
But you got to make me change my mind

E                      A      B7                E    E7 E
Baby I got your number, and I know that you got mine
    A                         A7   B7              E   E7 E
But you know that I called you, I  called too many times
        B7                   A
You can call me baby you can call me anytime
               E       E7 E
But you got to call me

E                              A           B7               E    E7 E
Give me one reason to stay here - and I'll turn right back around
A                              A7          B7               E   E7 E
Give me one reason to stay here - and I'll turn right back around
          B7
Because I don't want leave you lonely
    A                            E    E7 E
But you got to make me change my mind

  E                              A             B7           E    E7 E
I don't want no one to squeeze me - they might take away my life
  A                              A7            B7           E   E7 E
I don't want no one to squeeze me - they might take away my life
       B7                     A                        E    E7 E
I just want someone to hold me and rock me through the night

Break

     E                           A    B7                E    E7 E
This youthful heart can love you, and give you what you need
     A                          A7    B7                E   E7 E
This youthful heart can love you, and give you what you need
            B7                           A
But I'm too old to go chasing you around
                        E  E7 E
Wasting my precious energy

E                              A           B7               E    E7 E
Give me one reason to stay here - and I'll turn right back around
A                              A7          B7               E   E7 E
Give me one reason to stay here - and I'll turn right back around
          B7
Because I don't want leave you lonely
    A                            E    E7 E
But you got to make me change my mind

E                            A         B7              E    E7 E
Baby just give me one reason - Give me just one reason why
A                            A7        B7                           E   E7 E
Baby just give me one reason - Give me just one reason why I should stay
          B7                        A
Because I told you that I loved you
                           E    E7 A A7 E
And there ain't no more to say

songs.title: Don't Ask Me No Questions
songs.lyrics:
INTRO- G D C G,  THEN- C D G
VERSE 1
C                        D          G
Now, every time that I come home nobody wants to let me be.
C                    D                    G
Seems that all the friends I've got just got to come interrogate me.
C             D                   Em                           C
Well, I appreciate your feelings, and I don't want to pass you by,
G             D                           C                G
But I don't ask you about your business. Don't ask me about mine.
VERSE 2
C                      D                                 G
Well, it's true I love the money, and I love my brand new car.
C                          D                              G
I like drinkin' the best of whiskey and playin' in a honky-tonk bar.
C           D            Em         C
But when I come off the road, well I just got to have my time,
G           D            C             G
Cause I've got to find a break in this action, else I'm gonna lose my mind.
 
CHORUS
     G              D             C               G
So don't ask me no questions And I won't tell you no lies.
  G          D          C          G
Don't ask me about my business, And I won't tell you goodbye.
 
SOLO BREAK- Same chords as verse
 
VERSE 3
 
'What's your color? Do you dig the brothers?" is driving me up the wall,
And every time I think that I can sleep, some fool has got to call.
Well, don't you think that when I come home I just want a little piece of mind?
If you want to talk about this business, buddy, you're just wasting time.
 
CHORUS
So don't ask me no questions And I won't tell you no lies.
don't ask me about my business, And I won't tell you goodbye.
I said don't ask no stupid questions And I won't send you away.
If you want to talk fishin', Well I guess that'll be OK.

songs.title: Perfect
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
G
 
[Verse 1]
          G        Em
I found a love for me
              C                            D
Darling, just dive right in, and follow my lead
                G          Em
Well, I found a girl beautiful and sweet
        C                                     D
I never knew you were the someone waiting for me
 
[Pre-Chorus]
                                G
Cause we were just kids when we fell in love
            Em                      C                G  D
Not knowing what it was, I will not give you up this ti-ime
             G                           Em
Darling just kiss me slow, your heart is all I own
            C                     D
And in your eyes you're holding mine
 
[Chorus]
      Em   C             G          D              Em
Baby, I'm dancing in the dark, with you between my arms
C                G     D                Em
Barefoot on the grass, listening to our favourite song
          C                G                 D              Em
When you said you looked a mess, I whispered underneath my breath
         C                G        D             G
But you heard it, darling you look perfect tonight
 
| G D/F# Em D | C  D  |
 
[Verse 2]
                G                    Em
Well, I found a woman, stronger than anyone I know
              C                                          D
She shares my dreams, I hope that someday I'll share her home
           G             Em
I found a love, to carry more than just my secrets
         C                              D
To carry love, to carry children of our own
 
[Pre-Chorus]
                             G                     Em
We are still kids, but we're so in love, fighting against all odds
             C               G  D
I know we'll be alright this ti-ime
             G                              Em
Darling just hold my hand, be my girl, I'll be your man
         C               D
I see my future in your eyes
 
[Chorus]
      Em   C              G         D              Em
Baby, I'm dancing in the dark, with you between my arms
C                G     D                Em
Barefoot on the grass, listening to our favourite song
        C                G                D
When I saw you in that dress, looking so beautiful
  Em       C                  G        D          [ G ]
I don't deserve this, darling you look perfect tonight
 
[Interlude]
| G  | % | Em | % |
| C  | % | D  | % |
 
[Chorus]
      Em   C              G         D              Em
Baby, I'm dancing in the dark, with you between my arms
C                G     D                Em
Barefoot on the grass, listening to our favourite song
        C              G               D             Em
I have faith in what I see, now I know I have met an angel
    C          G         D
In person, and she looks perfect
 
[Outro]
  G/B     C           Dsus4    D        [ G ]
I don't deserve this, you look perfect tonight
 
| G D/F# Em D | C  D  | G

songs.title: Make It Rain
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Am Em B7 Em
Am Em B7 Em
 
 
[Verse 1]
Am                 Em
  When the sins of my father
B7              Em
  Weigh down in my soul
Am             Em
  And the pain of my mother
B7                Em
  Will not let me go
Am                           Em
  Well I know there can come fire from the sky
B7                            Em
  To refine the purest of kings
Am                            Em
  And even though I know this fire brings me pain
B7                     Em
  Even so and just the same
 
 
[Chorus]
        Am
Make it rain
        Em
Make it rain down Lord
        B7
Make it rain
            Em
Oh, make it rain
        Am
Make it rain
        Em
Make it rain down Lord
        B7
Make it rain
        Em
Make it rain
 
 
[Verse 2]
Am                       Em
  And the seed needs the water
B7                           Em
  Before it grows out of the ground
Am                             Em
  But it just keeps on getting hotter
B7                       Em
  And the hunger more profound
Am                           Em
  Well I know there can come tears from the eyes
B7                               Em
  But they may as well all be in vain
Am                        Em
  Even though I know this tears come with pain
B7                      Em
  Even so and just the same
 
 
[Chorus]
        Am
Make it rain
        Em
Make it rain down Lord
        B7
Make it rain
        Em
Oh, make it rain
        Am
Make it rain
        Em
Make it rain down Lord
        B7
Make it rain
        Em
Make it rain
 
 
[Guitar Solo]
Am Em B7 Em
Am Em B7 Em
 
**I have no idea of the actual tab, plus I play acoustic so it likely won't be right if I tried to figure it
out for you guys*
 
 
[Verse 3]
Am                         Em
  And the seas are full of water
B7                 Em
  That stop by the shore
Am                        Em
  Just like the riches of grandeur
B7                     Em
  That never reach the poor
Am                              Em
  So let the clouds fill with thunderous applause
B7                      Em
  And let lightning be the veins
Am                      Em
  And fill the sky with all that they can drop
B7                           Em
  When it's time to make a change 
 
 
[Chorus]
        Am
Make it rain
        Em
Make it rain down Lord
        B7
Make it rain
        Em
Oh, make it rain
        Am
Make it rain
        Em
Make it rain down Lord
        B7
Make it rain
        Em
Make it rain
 
 
[Chorus]
        Am
Make it rain
        Em
Make it rain down Lord
        B7
Make it rain
        Em
Oh, make it rain
        Am
Make it rain
        Em
Make it rain down Lord
        B7
Make it rain

Oh, make it rain
 
 
[Chorus]
        Am

Make it rain

Make it rain

Make it rain
        Em
Make it rain

Make it rain

Oh, make it rain

messages.message: Hey man! I really love this song. I'm going to work on the second verse.
Thanks! I can't wait to see what you come up with.
so I've been working on a guitar solo for this song. I really dig it
looking forward to that guitar stuff you were talking about
yeah I'll work on it this weekend and probably throw it up on Sunday
